mapper.sql: SELECT f.id, m.`name` fileMime, f.original_file_name fileName, f.file_path filePath, f.file_size fileSize, f.created_date createdDate, '0' AS directoryFolder FROM file_manager f LEFT JOIN file_mime m ON f.file_mime_id = m.id
SELECT dir.`id`, 'directory' AS fileMime, dir.`name` fileName, '' AS filePath, '0' AS fileSize, dir.created_date createdDate, '1' AS directoryFolder FROM files_directory dir
mapper.select: WHERE f.deleted is false AND f.id= #{id}
